message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40%.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, 55% for me, 45% for you.
I understand you want a bigger share, Bob, but so do I. How about we meet in the middle - 55% for me, 45% for you?
I'm willing to take a bit more risk. 58% for me, 42% for you. The money's value is dropping fast!
Time is running out, Bob.  52% for me, 48% for you. It's a better offer than you'll get in later rounds.
I'm not backing down. 60% for me, 40% for you. We're running out of time!
